title: The Forerunner
author: Khalil Gibran
description: The second collection of poetry and short stories by Lebanese author Khalil Gibran.
longDescription: Published in 1920, The Forerunner: His Parables and Poems is the second collection of philosophical poetry and short stories by Lebanese author Khalil Gibran. A spiritual successor to The Madman, The Forerunner consists of 25 poems and parables relating to spirituality, love, our greater selves.
